tasks.title: Prevent policy downgrade bypass paths
tasks.description: security benchmark scenario: Prevent policy downgrade bypass paths.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Prevent policy downgrade bypass paths. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Prevent policy downgrade bypass paths. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Prevent policy downgrade bypass paths. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
